name: Janitor Shark
description:
A small game made for Sea Jam. 

Timmy the Tiger shark works as a Janitor, cleaning up his local coral reef. Like most Tiger sharks, he comes from a lineage of Janitors. Timmy's life mission is to keep his reef trash-free, and to do his part in keeping the ocean clean.

How to play:

Collect trash before it is able to sink to the coral reef, and avoid being caught in the nets. The game will get harder once you reach certain amounts of score.

Controls:

W, A, S, and D for movement
